name: Re: Cubed
description:
Re: Cubed is a game where you muse solve puzzles by controlling a cute little cube character. This cube possesses the soul of a hero, and every time the cube dies, they will be reincarnated into a new body. Use this to your advantage by dying in opportune places to help you in your next life. 

Unfortunately, their new body has a very short life span, so be quick, and get to the nearest checkpoint before the time runs out! You also can only jump after collecting jump boots, but you can jump once for every pair of boots you collect.

Controls:

Move: WASD, ArrowKeys, or left control stick

Jump: Space, Left Click, or X(PS4)

Die: Left Shift, Right Click, or Square(PS4)

Credits:

Programming, Level Design, Art, Everything Else:

Jasmine Stephens

Music:

The Cynic Project / cynicmusic.com / pixelsphere.org
